headline: This API Documents Itself
subtext:
Optic writes, verifies, and helps you update the API specification so you can focus on building great software.

Ready to try Optic on your API?

everywhere.heading: Optic ensures all API changes are **documented and reviewed**
everywhere.description: Imagine Git, but for your APIs. Optic Documents your existing APIs in minutes by observing traffic, and learning how each endpoint behaves. It then diffs your team's development and test traffic as they your work to catch API changes and ensure each change is documented and reviewed before getting deployed.
